layman_description: First aid items you use to heal wounds and restore health.
technical_description: Consumable item with healing output value and application method.

layman_description: Canned food that fills your hunger and gives health.
technical_description: Consumable with hunger satiation value and nutritional benefit.
player_impact: Reduces hunger and partially restores health.

layman_description: Pills that boost your wellness and help with disease resistance.
technical_description: Consumable item that increases wellness stat when ingested.
player_impact: Improves your overall health and disease resistance.

layman_description: Hot drink that soothes your stomach and boosts wellness.
technical_description: Beverage consumable with wellness increase and dysentery prevention.
player_impact: Restores wellness and prevents stomach illness.

layman_description: Baked bread that fills your stomach and gives energy.
technical_description: Food item with hunger reduction and calorie value.

layman_description: Cooked animal meat that fills hunger and restores some health.
technical_description: Cooked food with high hunger satisfaction and health recovery.
player_impact: Good source of hunger relief and health restoration.

layman_description: Drink made from plant extract that quenches thirst.
Medicine that cures infections and reduces infection symptoms.
technical_description: Medical consumable that eliminates infection status effect.
player_impact: Clears infections and prevents health degradation.

layman_description: Pills that reduce pain from injuries.
technical_description: Consumable that reduces pain status effect duration.
player_impact: Reduces pain and its negative effects temporarily.

layman_description: Clean water in a bottle that quenches your thirst completely.
technical_description: Beverage item with thirst-reduction value and purity rating.
